p.seg: This fragmentary boundary marker records the placement of boundaries between two parties whose names are lost. The demarcation, carried out under the authority of the emperor Vespasian, was conducted by a military tribune who had been appointed as a judge (iudex datus) in the case by the governor of Dalmatia. The findspot is not known.
